query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `agentTasks` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `goal` text NOT NULL,
  `config` json,
  `status` enum('pending','running','paused','waiting','completed','failed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `currentPhase` varchar(255),
  `currentIteration` int DEFAULT 0,
  `totalToolCalls` int DEFAULT 0,
  `workingMemory` json,
  `artifacts` json,
  `result` text,
  `error` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `startedAt` timestamp,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastCheckpointAt` timestamp,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `agentQueue` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `taskId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `priority` int DEFAULT 0,
  `position` int NOT NULL,
  `status` varchar(32) DEFAULT 'queued',
  `workerId` varchar(64),
  `queuedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `startedAt` timestamp,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `agentSteps` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `taskId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `stepNumber` int NOT NULL,
  `type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `content` text,
  `thinking` text,
  `toolName` varchar(128),
  `toolArgs` json,
  `toolResult` json,
  `status` varchar(32) DEFAULT 'pending',
  `startedAt` timestamp,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `agentCheckpoints` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `taskId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `stepNumber` int NOT NULL,
  `state` json NOT NULL,
  `reason` varchar(255),
  `isAutomatic` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `agentEvents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `taskId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `eventType` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `data` json,
  `sequence` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
